mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NUM, NVL(ITEM_NUM,'') AS ITEM_NUM, NVL(FILE_NUM,'') AS FILE_NUM, NVL(FILE_ORG,'') AS FILE_ORG, NVL(FILE_NAME,'') AS FILE_NAME, NVL(FILE_IDX,'') AS FILE_IDX, NVL(FILE_DATE,'') AS FILE_DATE FROM ZIP_ITEM_FILE WHERE ITEM_NUM = #{itemNum}

SELECT NVL(SINK,'N') SINK, NVL(AIR,'N') AIR, NVL(LAUNDRY,'N') LAUNDRY, NVL(REFRIGERATOR,'N') REFRIGERATOR, NVL(CLOSET,'N') CLOSET, NVL(GASRANGE,'N') GASRANGE, NVL(INDUCTION,'N') INDUCTION, NVL(MICRO,'N') MICRO, NVL(DESK,'N') DESK, NVL(BED,'N') BED, NVL(ENTRANCE,'N') ENTRANCE, NVL(CAMERATV,'N') CAMERATV, NVL(INTERCOM,'N') INTERCOM FROM ZIP_ITEM_OPTION WHERE ITEM_NUM = #{itemNum}

SELECT NVL(ITEM_NUM ,0) ITEM_NUM ,NVL(ITEM_PTYPE,'') ITEM_PTYPE ,NVL(ITEM_ITYPE,'') ITEM_ITYPE ,NVL(ITEM_NAME,'') ITEM_NAME ,NVL(ITEM_DEPOSIT,0) ITEM_DEPOSIT ,NVL(ITEM_MONTH_PRICE,0) ITEM_MONTH_PRICE ,NVL(FILE_NAME,'') FILE_NAME FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RN ,A.ITEM_NAME ,A.ITEM_NUM ,A.ITEM_PTYPE ,A.ITEM_ITYPE ,D.ITEM_DEPOSIT ,D.ITEM_MONTH_PRICE ,B.FILE_NAME FROM ZIP_ITEM A, ZIP_ITEM_DETAIL D, ( SELECT ITEM_NUM, FILE_NAME FROM ZIP_ITEM_FILE WHERE FILE_IDX = 1 ORDER BY FILE_NUM ASC)B WHERE A.ITEM_NUM = B.ITEM_NUM AND A.ITEM_NUM = D.ITEM_NUM AND A.ITEM_STATUS != 'N' AND A.AGENT_ID = #{userId} AND A.ITEM_NUM != #{itemNum}) WHERE RN <4

SELECT D.ITEM_INTRO, D.ITEM_INTRO_DETAIL, D.ITEM_DEPOSIT, D.ITEM_MAINTAIN_PRICE, D.ITEM_MONTH_PRICE, D.ITEM_AREA, D.ITEM_PARKING, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.ITEM_BUILD_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),'') ITEM_BUILD_DATE, D.ITEM_ELEVATOR, D.ITEM_PET, D.ITEM_DIRECTION, D.ITEM_KIND, D.ITEM_FLOOR, D.ITEM_MOVE_AVBL, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.ITEM_MOVE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD'),'') ITEM_MOVE_DATE, A.ITEM_NAME, A.ITEM_ADDRESS, A.ITEM_ADDRESS_DETAIL, A.ITEM_PTYPE, A.ITEM_STATUS, TRUNC(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(A.REG_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD')) AS REG_DATE, A.RECOMMEND_ITEM, A.ITEM_COUNT, O.*, NVL(I.USER_ID,'N') AS LIKE_ITEM, U.AGENT_NAME, U.AGENT_INTRO, U.AGENT_RIGHT FROM ZIP_ITEM_DETAIL D, ZIP_ITEM A, ZIP_INTEREST_ITEM I, ZIP_AGENT U, ZIP_ITEM_OPTION O WHERE 1=1 AND D.ITEM_NUM = A.ITEM_NUM AND D.ITEM_NUM = O.ITEM_NUM(+) AND D.ITEM_NUM = I.ITEM_NUM(+) AND A.AGENT_ID = U.AGENT_ID(+) AND D.ITEM_NUM = #{itemNum}
AND I.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT ITEM_NUM,ITEM_NAME,ITEM_ADDRESS,ITEM_PTYPE,ITEM_ITYPE, ITEM_DEPOSIT,ITEM_MONTH_PRICE,ITEM_AREA,ITEM_KIND,FILE_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, NVL(A.ITEM_NUM,0) ITEM_NUM, NVL(A.ITEM_NAME,'') ITEM_NAME, NVL(A.ITEM_ADDRESS,'') ITEM_ADDRESS, NVL(A.ITEM_PTYPE,'') ITEM_PTYPE, NVL(A.ITEM_ITYPE,'') ITEM_ITYPE, NVL(B.ITEM_DEPOSIT,0) ITEM_DEPOSIT, NVL(B.ITEM_MONTH_PRICE,0) ITEM_MONTH_PRICE, NVL(B.ITEM_AREA,0) ITEM_AREA, NVL(B.ITEM_KIND,'') ITEM_KIND, NVL(C.FILE_NAME,'') FILE_NAME FROM ZIP_ITEM A, ZIP_ITEM_DETAIL B, (SELECT ITEM_NUM, FILE_NAME FROM ZIP_ITEM_FILE WHERE FILE_IDX = 1 ORDER BY FILE_NUM ASC)C WHERE A.ITEM_NUM = B.ITEM_NUM AND B.ITEM_NUM = C.ITEM_NUM ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC) WHERE RN<10
